com.nexus

Class ProfileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexus.ProfileService

  • public class ProfileService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has all the methods to support the ProfileController.
    Author:
    David Kopp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProfileService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.gson.JsonObject getUserProfile(java.lang.String username)
      This method gets all the information from the database for the profile page and wraps it all up in a json for the ProfileController and frontend.
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateAvatar(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This is a future method for taking a image object and saving it to the server.
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateCurrentGame(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This method updates the current game played in the user Profile
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateCurrentGames(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This method updates the gamesPlayed table.
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateFavGames(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This method updates the favGames table.
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateRealName(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This method updates the realName in the userProfile.
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateSocialGames(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This method updates the social table.
      com.google.gson.JsonObject updateUserDesc(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String body)
      This method updates the userDesc in the user profile table.
